content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or experiences. However, to answer your question, some potential side effects of laser teeth whitening include increased tooth sensitivity and gum irritation. In rare cases, the heat produced by the laser can damage the teeth or surrounding tissues. It's important to choose a reputable and experienced dentist or dental professional who can properly evaluate your oral health and determine if laser teeth whitening is a safe and viable option for you. It's also important to follow proper aftercare instructions to minimize any potential side effects.
